extendedInfo.description: The OFFICIAL Application of the Bradford BullsThis ultimate application is a MUST for fans providing all the news direct from the Odsal Stadium, fixtures and results, player profiles and links directly through to all social media without leaving the App.So you can visit the OFFICIAL YouTube channel, Twitter or Facebook accounts all from one place on your phone.This mini website will soon allow for you to purchase merchandise ALL DIRECTLY FROM YOUR PHONE!AND BEST OF ALL, IT'S COMPLETELY FREE!Join the Bulls in 2013 in our Quest for Success.

reviews.title: Ok but...
reviews.comment: Love this app but would love it more and rate it higher if the content was all in...can only get three player profiles up at the mo? Otherwise its great #COYB
reviews.author: Natalie Booth

reviews.title: Not the worst attempt at a first app but needs more work
reviews.comment: Massive bulls fan but the app doesn\'t offer anything really all the information is pulled from other sites of other app
reviews.author: Richard Murgatroyd

reviews.title: Would be higher if
reviews.comment: Quite a lot of permmisons needed to run this including making calls
reviews.author: martyn hartlebury

reviews.title: Bradford. Till i die
reviews.comment: Awesome App. I love the Bulls I am a Bull Till i die
reviews.author: Harry McGlone
